alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Wayne (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:18PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Wayne and east central Monroe Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 316 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brighton, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rochester, Greece, Irondequoit, East Rochester, Webster, Fairport, Brighton, Gates-North Gates, Henrietta, Penfield, Charlotte, Pittsford, Union Hill, West Walworth, Strong Memorial Hospital, Rochester International Airport and Rochester General Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Brief, heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and will limit visibility. If traveling, slow down and allow extra space between you and the vehicle ahead.
